headline: Estée Lauder Lawsuit Tests Walmart Marketplace Oversight And Investor Expectations
summary: Estée Lauder has filed a lawsuit against Walmart, alleging that counterfeit cosmetics were sold through Walmart's third party online marketplace. The case centers on product authenticity and oversight of marketplace sellers, an area that is increasingly important for large retailers with growing e commerce platforms. For investors watching NasdaqGS:WMT, this legal dispute comes at a time when Walmart's shares trade at $133.89, with returns of 2.1% over the past week and 11.9% over the past...
